fields.description: YARN-8191 introduced API-incompatible changes, which would break some classesÂ in hive (e.g. https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/shims/scheduler/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/schshim/FairSchedulerShim.java), this ticket's goal is to fix the incompatible changes.
fields.summary: Fix API incompatible changes in FairScheduler's AllocationFileLoaderService
